name: Entrenchment Ratio (ER) A, B and Bc Streams
shortName: Entrenchment Ratio (ER) A, B and Bc Streams
functionStatement: Frequent overbank flows access the floodplain, reducing flood peaks and supporting nutrient processing and off-channel refugia.
descriptionMarkdown: Degree of floodplain access during moderate floods; low ER indicates incision and reduced overbank connectivity.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel/Floodplain

Method: Field (survey) or Desktop (LiDAR cross sections)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure flood-prone width and bankfull width/depth per SQT method; compute ER = flood-prone width / bankfull width (or per SQT definition).
